ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Therefore here today he has no friend
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is why he has no friend today,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Today he has been left here friendless;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On this day, they will have no friends
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So he does not have any friend here this day.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, no friend has he here this Day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore he has not here today a true friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therefore he today has not here one loyal friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor hath he no lover here this day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so today he has no friend here,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore for him here this Day there is no friend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: so he has no friend here today,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So no friend hath he here this Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So no friend has he here this Day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Today he shall have no loyal friend here,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So he has no friend here today.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:35] therefore here today he has no [loyal] friend, [no] relative to avail him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore hath he no lover here this day) this day he has no relative to benefit him,
